name: [LD38] Lottery: You Judge Them I Judge You
name_original: [LD38] Lottery: You Judge Them I Judge You
description:
Lottery: You judge them I judge you

A game made for ludumdare 38. The theme: A Small World

Source code: https://github.com/doppelgunner/LD38_Lottery/

Youtube timelapse: https://youtu.be/Da3xAL9Xz0o

Youtube demo: https://youtu.be/-X_mZQa6t1I

In-game ratings of coins (how I see you)

  • sword = people who loves violence
  • water drop = likes peace
  • pillow = easy go lucky types
  • paper with pen = values quality and development
  • bird = hope for the future, for the good of many
  • crying or tears = compassionate
  • special coin = secret (!)

For nice experience please download the exe if you are on a windows pc machine. Also in the browser there is a minor sound error / bug.

Not sure if max and linux builds are working. I just built them.
